results.content_html: terrible english speech, but the course is good

results.content:
So far, 6 lectures in, it's just a quick overview of what's being covered in the course. The teacher talks a bit fast but still easy enough to understand.

Update: From what I've viewed so far, this course is not for the ultimate casual beginner. First, the course is taught using a Linux OS (Ubuntu) therefore, if you're a beginner and only have a Windows or MacOS computer, there is a lot more software requirements that you will need to install to be able to run the basic software. This course also requires the use of Python3 and installing other packages. This is brushed over quickly but not fully explained so a true beginner will definitely have a hard time just starting this course.
